articles.title: EDP Renewables to invest up to S$10 billion by 2030 for clean energy hub in Singapore - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: EDP Renewables (EDPR), the world's fourth-largest renewable energy producer, said on Thursday (Feb 24) it plans to invest up to S$10 billion by 2030 to establish a clean energy hub in Singapore for the Asia Pacific region.

articles.title: Asian stocks plunge after Putin announces action in Ukraine - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Asian stock markets plunged and oil prices surged Thursday after President Vladimir Putin announced Russian military action in Ukraine.
articles.content:
BEIJING (AP) - Asian stock markets plunged and oil prices surged Thursday after President Vladimir Putin announced Russian military action in Ukraine.
